sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.debug-panel(v-if="enable")
  h1 {{ text }}
</template>
<script>
import { mapState } from 'pinia'
import { useItemStore } from '../store/item'
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      item: 'hi',
      enable: false
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(useItemStore,['text'])
  }
}
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
@import 'src/styles/flex';

.debug-panel {
  @include flex-center();
  z-index: 1000;
  width: 300px;
  height: 300px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 100px;
  right: 250px;
  border: 1px red dotted;
}
</style>
